## DataAdapter.append() method

Add text to the end of a plaintext file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
append(normalizedPath: string, data: string, options?: DataWriteOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>normalizedPath</code> | <code>string</code> | path to file, use [normalizePath()](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/normalizePath.md) to normalize beforehand. |
|  <code>data</code> | <code>string</code> | the text to append. |
|  <code>options</code> | [`DataWriteOptions`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataWriteOptions.md) | _(Optional)_ (Optional) |

**Returns:**

`Promise``<void>`
